string.body: You have a new campaign quest.

string.name: STR_QUEST_NAME_Q9619
string.body: [Test] Addition of repeated additional class rewards

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_001
string.body: You took my clothes! Come back here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_002
string.body: What are the Krall doing here!?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_005
string.body: They must never learn about our Revolution!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_008
string.body: Please escort me safely to the village.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_009
string.body: Let's walk a little slower for a while...

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_016
string.body: Now, please escort me somewhere safe.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_017
string.body: Can we walk slower for a while?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_022
string.body: Now I can rest in peace...Thank you....

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_028
string.body: You had one job, and you couldn't even do that!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_029
string.body: We're under attack! Help me out here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_030
string.body: You wretch! You dare to lie? Die!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_031
string.body: A curse on the Twelve Warriors of Seggurheim!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_033
string.body: I can't believe you chased me all the way here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_034
string.body: You took my clothes! Come back here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_035
string.body: This Shugo will report new information to Valerius later, nyerk.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_036
string.body: You took my clothes! Come back here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_037
string.body: You took my clothes! Come back here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_041
string.body: You must meet a Krall called Gardugu.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_042
string.body: How can you hope to escape when you're this slow?!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_043
string.body: I'm going back--do whatever you want!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_044
string.body: Lead the way, then. I'll follow you.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_045
string.body: How dare you turn me into a Ribbit?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_047
string.body: It won't be easy with empty hands.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_049
string.body: Tell Actaeon what I told you.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_054
string.body: Who dares distub my eternal sleep?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_056
string.body: The time has...Time...Now you have no time left to stay on the ground.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_057
string.body: Myanee! Myanee, is it really you?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_059
string.body: I'm sorry. I mistook you for someone else.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_060
string.body: You should go to the altar behind there. Follow me.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_063
string.body: Finally I got my look back!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_064
string.body: Bollvig's Obelisk cursed me...but now.... Thank you!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_065
string.body: Nerison! All my family and friends died because of him!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_066
string.body: I will never forgive Nerison. Bring him to me.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_068
string.body: I must return to the flow of Aether now.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_070
string.body: So, what should I do now?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_071
string.body: There's no need for me to remain in this world.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_072
string.body: Thank you. I have found my eternal rest.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_073
string.body: Thank you! My body and mind are at ease.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_074
string.body: Thief! Take you hands off those research notes!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_076
string.body: I'm tired! I'm just so tired!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_084
string.body: At this rate, we'll never get there!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_085
string.body: Let's hurry--we don't have much time!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_086
string.body: When will we ever escape if you keep being this slow?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_088
string.body: There's no time to waste. Let's go!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_089
string.body: Lead the way, quickly. They'll catch us!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_090
string.body: Is it far from here? It's hard for me to walk.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_091
string.body: It's so far away, and I'm so tired.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_092
string.body: We're running out of time! Can't we go faster?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_093
string.body: We're running out of time! Let's run!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_094
string.body: What's the delay? Do you even know the way?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_095
string.body: I'm going back--do whatever you want!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_096
string.body: I was a fool to trust you!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_097
string.body: I'm too tired to go on.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_098
string.body: How far out of the way did you take us, anyway?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_099
string.body: Is this how it all ends?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_100
string.body: Sob, I never thought it would end like this.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_001
string.body: Thank you for holding a ritual for the spirits.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_006
string.body: Thank you for breaking the seal of Kromede, [%username]!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_007
string.body: You covet the Sacred Chalice? Then die!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_011
string.body: Thank you. I'll take carrrre of the ressst.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_012
string.body: Chieftain Chaikata, you can trusssst this perrrrson.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_013
string.body: Oh, I forgot about the flint and Abex meat.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_014
string.body: Now the Mist Mane are dead meat! Khhhhhh!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_016
string.body: Now that I have bathed in my beloved Hot Springs, I can die without regret.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_017
string.body: Hmm, this smell seems to be lacking something.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_018
string.body: I need something to make smoke with.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_019
string.body: Did you send the secret signal?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_022
string.body: My legs hurt. Let's rest for a while.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_023
string.body: We made it. Here, over here!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF2_028
string.body: My goodness! It was a fake Sacred Chalice!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF3_001
string.body: What did you do to the boosting device?!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF3_002
string.body: We're saved! All thanks to you, Daeva!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DF3_003
string.body: This is imbued with all the divine blessings!

string.body: A crystal saturated with pure energy. It will make a good weapon after it has been refined.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30342b_DESC
string.body: A crystal saturated with pure energy. It will make a good weapon after it has been refined.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30343b_DESC
string.body: A crystal saturated with pure energy. It will make a good weapon after it has been refined.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30325a_DESC
string.body: Relics infused with the power of the Balaur. Rumour has it that Shulacks illegally trade these relics at a very high price.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30261A_DESC
string.body: A fragment emanating strange Aether energy. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 50 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30263A_DESC
string.body: Medicine used to treat injured Shugos.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30264A_DESC
string.body: A stunning necklace with elaborate adornments. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 50 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30265A_DESC
string.body: A polearm with inscriptions on its handle. Elyos of level 50 or above can receive the quest by double-clicking it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30361A_DESC
string.body: A fragment emanating strange Aether energy. Double-click to begin a quest. Asmodian, level 50 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30363A_DESC
string.body: Medicine used to treat injured Shugos.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30364A_DESC
string.body: A stunning necklace with elaborate adornments. Double-click to begin a quest. Asmodian, level 50 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_30365A_DESC
string.body: An old diary with yellowed pages. Double-click to begin a quest. Asmodian, level 50 or above.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_30365A_DESC
string.body: An old diary found in the Abyssal Splinter. Asmodians of level 50 or above can receive the quest by double-clicking it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF2_004
string.body: The last rubbing is done. Take them to Serimnir!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF2_005
string.body: It's still a bit too lively. Maybe I should have worn it out a bit more before I brought it back...

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF2_008
string.body: Listen to me for a bit, [%username]! I know something about the thing that the Daeva is looking for, nyerk.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_001
string.body: Thank you for returning me to the flow of Aether.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_005
string.body: I'm so tired. Now I can rest.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_007
string.body: I don't want to be a Banshee any longer.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_008
string.body: I'm returning to the flow of Aether....

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_009
string.body: I'm free! I want to see my brother Manos. And Nola!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_010
string.body: I'll put on some clothes like Myanee wore.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_011
string.body: The jewel is now imbued with the Elim's blessings!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF3_012
string.body: The jewel is now imbued with all the blessings!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LC1_001
string.body: We imbued the jewel with Aether energy!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LC1_002
string.body: O Lady Ariel, [%username] vows eternal loyalty to thee. Carve thy will on this Oath Stone!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LC1_003
string.body: O Lady Ariel, please bestow the glory of light on [%username], who is now a Miragent Holy Templar!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LC1_004
string.body: It's all done, so please check if you have an additional Stigma slot. You can get the Greater Stigma from the Stigma Distributor.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LC1_005
string.body: I think the experiment was successful. Please check your Stigma slots now!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DC1_001
string.body: We've completed the Amulet of Insight!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DC1_002
string.body: I've listened to all advice on the battle against the Elyos!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DC1_003
string.body: Lord Azphel, please cleanse the body and soul of [%username] with this holy water!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DC1_004
string.body: Lord Azphel, please lay your blessing of darkness on [%username], who is now one of the Fenris Fangs!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DC1_005
string.body: It's done, so see if you have another Stigma slot. You can get the Greater Stigma from the Stigma Distributor.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_DC1_006
string.body: The experiment was a success, [%username]! Check your Stigma slots now.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDShip_01
string.body: I can go alone from here. Thank you, Daeva.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDShip_02
string.body: Fare you well. Maybe I can do something for you someday.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDShip_03
string.body: Then I'll be on my way. Look out for Shulacks!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDShip_04
string.body: You'll not leave the Steel Claw alive!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_AB1_001
string.body: I ought to weaken him some more!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_AB1_003
string.body: I need an Artefact Activation Stone!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_AB1_005
string.body: They are puppets that look like Brigade Generals from the Ereshkigal Legion I have a bad feeling about this...

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_AB1_006
string.body: I'm just bursting with energy! Thanks!

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_01
string.body: I'll need a key to open this.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_02
string.body: I'll need a key to open this.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_06
string.body: I don't think I can do this alone. I just need one more person to help me push it!

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_07
string.body: The shell is too hard to break.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_08
string.body: Oh, Robstin.... I'll avenge you with blood!

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_LF4_B7_Chest_01
string.body: This key doesn't fit! I need another one.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_12
string.body: You need three keys to open the box.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_IDDF2_dflame_TreasureBox_Red
string.body: You need a key to open Kromede's Fancy Chest.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_IDDF2_dflame_TreasureBox_Green
string.body: You need a key to open Kromede's Shimmering Chest.

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_IDDF2_dflame_TreasureBox_Blue
string.body: You need a key to open Kromede's Shimmering Treasure Chest.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q20020a
string.body: It would be best if I leave this place right now.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q20020b
string.body: What? Did you know that thing has such power?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDCatacombs_001
string.body: Curses. There wasn't enough material, and now I've wasted a very special Shulack Refiner.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDDreadgion_02_001
string.body: Take it if you need it. It isn't even mine.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDAbRe_Core_002
string.body: Don't touch that artefact so carelessly! A really terrible creature will come out, nyerk!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDNovice_01
string.body: You need a Rusty Key and 3 Lubricating Oil to open the box.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q21075a
string.body: Just you wait, Gyorvin. I'll pay you back for everything you did to me.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q21075b
string.body: Gyorvin, you sun-poxed slime! You'll pay for this!

string.name: STR_DF4_Q21249B
string.body: This is amazing! Tell Javis that I'll be there in a little while. I want to take in a bit more of these sights.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDCromede_004
string.body: The door to the Kaliga Treasury should be around here somewhere....

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDYun_001
string.body: Now I can return to the main force thanks to you.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDYun_002
string.body: Not yet... I haven't fought Balaur properly...

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_IDRaksha_Q29703
string.body: Ah... I can feel the warmth of life flowing through the egg once again.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_Q10052
string.body: I was to find the room of the Pro... tector... I'm sorry, master[f:"mistress"]...

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_001
string.body: No reaction. Grido may be disappointed.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_001
string.body: Aurio, wait! This medicine will take me to you!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_002
string.body: Owllaet! I just received permission from father... Owllaet?! Accursed Daeva! What did you do to her?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_003
string.body: I can't believe it! I'm finally free!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_005
string.body: I'll show Feyos.... Petrahulk, stop now!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_007
string.body: By the name of the Dragon Lords, thou canst not stop us!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_010
string.body: After all that's happened, you still persist with this pathetic conflict?!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_011
string.body: This is not your conflict to end, Reian! The Asmodians have no rightful place in Atreia!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_012
string.body: You fool! You'll fight each other for years, all the while ignoring the growing Balaur threat!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_013
string.body: It does when you fight on my land, Asmodian. Still, it's clear that you will not listen. Fight each other, but never again on Reian soil. Understand?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_014
string.body: We can handle the Balaur just as we handle the Elyos. Either way, the coward is right: this matter doesn't concern you.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4a_015
string.body: The Humnaz Ritual Coordinator is coming to investigate some horrible smell in the Altar!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q36501a
string.body: I smell something fishy around here.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q36507a
string.body: I smell something fishy around here.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q36513a
string.body: I smell something fishy around here.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q46501a
string.body: I smell something fishy around here.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q46507a
string.body: I smell something fishy around here.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Q46513a
string.body: I smell something fishy around here.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_01
string.body: Ready to start running Crucible, nyerk?

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_02
string.body: I hope you got yourself a Worthiness Ticket, nyerk.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_04
string.body: Hope you are ready, because Stage 4 is about to begin!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_05
string.body: Good progress. Let me know when you want to begin Stage 5!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_06
string.body: Five down! Stage 6 about to begin!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_07
string.body: Focus. Stage 7 will be more difficult!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_08
string.body: Stage 8 ready for you! Are you ready for it?

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_09
string.body: Stay sharp. Tell me when you're ready for Stage 9, nyerk.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_Start_10
string.body: Are you ready for final Stage 10?

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_End_10
string.body: Wonderful, Daeva! You completed entire Crucible! Very impressive, nyerk!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Start_01
string.body: Quick lollygagging! Come over here if you want to start Stage 1.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Start_02
string.body: Get ready! It's time for Stage 2 to start, nyerk!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Start_04
string.body: Take a deep breath now... it's time for Stage 4 to begin.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Start_05
string.body: When you've recovered your composure, let me know and you can move on to Stage 5, nyerk.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Start_06
string.body: Are you ready? Shall I start up Stage 6?

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_End_06
string.body: Congratulations! You have completed Stage 6, nyerk!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Hidden
string.body: A Crucible Rift has appeared at the spot where Vanktrist vanished. I'd better go investigate!

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Hidden1
string.body: Hmm, just as I suspected... Tiamat's Balaur have infiltrated the Crucible.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_Say_Hidden2
string.body: Weird. It looks like a Crucible... just not OUR Crucible. I wonder who it belongs to?

string.name: STR_QUEST_MAIL_TEST
string.body: Title: Please complete the final mission\nBody First Line - You have acquired the final mission. Please talk to %SenderName, %ReceiverName.\n Body Second Line - Please make a good use of %attachMoney Kinah and %attachItemCount %attachItemName that come attached.

string.name: STR_QUEST_MAIL_Q1940
string.body:
Title: This is a message from the Wings of Kaisinel
The Wings of Kaisinel would like to inform %ReceiverName of an important announcement.
If you wish to significantly improve your flying skill, please come and see me, Idomeneus.
I will be waiting for you at the Sky Canal in Sanctum.
May Lord Kaisinel grant you enlightenment.

string.name: STR_QUEST_MAIL_Q2948
string.body:
Title: The 9th Pandaemonium Research Centre.
To aid Daevas battling enemies in the Abyss, the 9th Pandaemonium Research Centre is developing more enhanced wings.
If you wish to know more or have any questions, please look for Huron at the Pandaemonium Plaza.
May Azphel's protection go with you.

string.name: STR_QUEST_MAIL_Q2076
string.body:
Title: Summons
You will present itself to the Shadow Court in Pandaemonium immediately.
Should you not comply with the summons, the Shadow Executors will be dispatched to enforce this order.
The Court of Silence

string.name: STR_QUEST_MAIL_Q9560
string.body:
Title: Daeva's Day Event
 
Sanctum is issuing souvenirs in honour of Daeva's Day.
 
Please bring the enclosed coupon to me, and you will receive a pretty pointy hat and firecrackers.
 
From Ias

string.name: STR_QUEST_MAIL_Q9561
string.body:
Title: Daeva's Day Event
 
Pandaemonium is issuing souvenirs in honour of Daeva's Day.
 
Please bring the enclosed coupon to me, and you will receive a pretty pointy hat and firecrackers.
 
From Belenus

string.name: STR_IDArena_Say_SubMC_01
string.body: Are any Daevas left? I'll send them to the next stage, nyerk.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_002
string.body: Ah, finally! The curse is broken!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_003
string.body: Release! You have my eternal gratitude, Daeva.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_004
string.body: Finally, I've got rid of the Balaur Lords' curse! Thank you very much!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_005
string.body: How dare thee invade Tiamat's sacred Heart!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_006
string.body: I have to break the Fragmented Pyreogre.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_007
string.body: I have to break the Fragmented Gapemaw.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_008
string.body: How dare thee invade Tiamat's sacred Heart!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_009
string.body: We'll handle them. Please kill Danitur the Renegade.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_010
string.body: Ak! Ak! Enos will crush camp! Daeva, stop it!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_011
string.body: Crystals! Crystals, yes! Get the crystals, Daeva!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_014
string.body: Gosh, it turned into a rock!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_017
string.body: It's about time we got these supplies!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF4b_018
string.body: The Giant Crater was connected to the Heart of Fissure!

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_IDEVENT01
string.body: You need three keys to open the box.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5b_001
string.body: Finally I've gotten rid of the curse!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5b_005
string.body: How long do we have to keep going?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5b_006
string.body: But I don't want to go...

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5b_008
string.body: Do we really have to go?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5b_009
string.body: Did you think you'd be let go just like that?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5b_012
string.body: Did you think you'd be let go just like that?

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5a_001
string.body: The scroll is not sufficient for removing the ward

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Rider_001
string.body: The Id energy cannot be felt.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Rider_002
string.body: The Id energy cannot be felt.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_Rider_003
string.body: A concentrated flow of Id can be felt. The Abyss Gate seems to have been activated.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LDF5_Fortress_001
string.body: A concentrated flow of Id is palpable. Maybe you could figure out where the device is.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF5_004
string.body: Ridiculous! Do you really think that'll make me talk?!

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF5_007
string.body: I don't know what it is... I only know that Tiamat sunk the old area and sealed the new one to hide something.

string.name: STR_QUEST_SAY_LF5_008
string.body: That is... a creature that will burn in Hell forever... even Tiamat fears this ancient being...

string.name: STR_COMMON_SAY_Event_Koschei
string.body: You can't defeat me without a pointy needle!

string.body: If I Only Had a Master

string.name: STR_QUEST_3003a_DESC
string.body: A solid stone tinged in red.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3003b_DESC
string.body: A solid shell tinged in violet.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3004a_DESC
string.body: The ceremonial earrings of Mau Chieftan Umkata.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_3006a_DESC
string.body: A piece of letter found in Gestanerk's pocket. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3009a_DESC
string.body: A pendant inscribed with the name Kelaino.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3012a_DESC
string.body: It looks like a piece of wood.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_3013a_DESC
string.body: The rest of Gestanerk's letter. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3018a_DESC
string.body: Engraved with a woman's profile, and the name Rokes.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3019a_DESC
string.body: A lock of hair tied with a string.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3022a_DESC
string.body: Red meat with a terrible odor.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3023a_DESC
string.body: A bottle of tangy black powder.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3023b_DESC
string.body: Wood lunch boxes bound with a string.

string.name: STR_QUEST_1092a_DESC
string.body: A transparent crystal that gives off heat.

string.name: STR_QUEST_1093a_DESC
string.body: If you eat this piece of candy, you will turn into a Calydon. You should eat it before you reach the Broken Fang Bridge.\nCannot be used if you have already eaten a different piece of transformation candy. The previous transformation has to be lifted first.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_1093b_DESC
string.body: A rubbed copy of the First Calydon Stone Plate.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_1093c_DESC
string.body: A rubbed copy of the Second Calydon Stone Plate.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_1093d_DESC
string.body: A rubbed copy of the Third Calydon Stone Plate.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_1094e_DESC
string.body: A picture book whose cover shows a huge weapon and a peculiar orb. Double-click it to read it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_1094a_DESC
string.body: A sparkling yellow orb carved with a bud.

string.name: STR_QUEST_1094b_DESC
string.body: A sparkling red orb carved with a flame.

string.name: STR_QUEST_1094c_DESC
string.body: A sparkling blue orb carved with a flower.

string.name: STR_QUEST_1094d_DESC
string.body: A sparkling green orb carved with a mask.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3034a_DESC
string.body: It resembles a Artefact Activation Stone, but rather antiquated.

string.name: STR_QUEST_3035a_DESC

string.name: STR_QUEST_11003a_DESC
string.body: A substance made by extracting the energy of a Seafoam. It is used to make an Illusion Sphere.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11003b_DESC
string.body: A substance made by extracting Excura's energy. It is used to make an Illusion Sphere.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11004a_DESC
string.body: A pouch containing cured Elemental Stone powder.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11006a_DESC
string.body: A glass bottle with nothing inside. You must fill the bottle with water from Wildheart Grove.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11006b_DESC
string.body: A glass bottle with nothing inside. You must fill the bottle with water from Dimaia Fountainfall.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11006c_DESC
string.body: A glass bottle filled with the water of the Wildheart Grove.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11006d_DESC
string.body: A glass bottle filled with the water from the Dimaia Fountainhead.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11006e_DESC
string.body: A glass bottle brimming with mysteriously sparkling water.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11006f_DESC
string.body: A water bottle filled with clear water.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11008a_DESC
string.body: A letter written by Brigade General Versetti to encourage his men.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11009a_DESC
string.body: A package of good weight. It's for someone else, so don't look inside!

string.name: STR_QUEST_11009b_DESC
string.body: A report prepared by Sulinia. It seems to have been delayed quite a bit.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11010a_DESC
string.body: Military supply medicine made by Lionel.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11011a_DESC
string.body: You can feel a mysterious energy from this herb.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11012a_DESC
string.body: Fess textile bandage soaked in root plant medicine. It looks like it could heal any kind of injury.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11022a_DESC
string.body: Animal fluid of high viscosity. It stinks a lot.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11024a_DESC
string.body: A hard bird beak made to crack seed shells with ease.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11025a_DESC
string.body: The beak of the unusually large Crestlich Boco. It's definitely not ordinary.

string.name: STR_quest_11026a_DESC
string.body: It contains Boco's Beak and a report prepared by Veloso.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11028a_DESC
string.body: The fluid of a Neokin that has been influenced by Drana.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11028b_DESC
string.body: The fluid of a Crestlich that has been influenced by Drana.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11028c_DESC
string.body: The fluid of a Murmur that has been influenced by Drana.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11031a_DESC
string.body: A Moonflower part that could make for a good dish...you hope.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11031b_DESC
string.body: An...interesting looking salad made from Moonflower parts.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11032a_DESC
string.body: It is fuzzy but looks chewy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11032b_DESC
string.body: A dish made by mixing thinly sliced tentacles with sweet and sour spice.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11033b_DESC
string.body: It's hard to tell from a glance what ingredients it was made from.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11035b_DESC
string.body: It looks like an Inggison map and has marks here and there.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11036a_DESC
string.body: A book containing the traditional Shulack recipes. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11039a_DESC
string.body: Although heavy, the helmet has a smooth surface.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11042a_DESC
string.body: A beard cut from a Shulack.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11043a_DESC
string.body: The core detached from the Blue Aether Searcher. It glows brightly with Aether.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11043b_DESC
string.body: The core detached from the Shining Aerial Aether Searcher. It glows brightly with Aether.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11043c_DESC
string.body: The core detached from the Old Aether Searcher. It glows brightly with Aether.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11043d_DESC
string.body: The core detached from the Light Aether Searcher. It glows brightly with Aether.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11044a_DESC
string.body: An Aether crystal extracted from a living creature. Unprocessed, it is dark and murky.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11044b_DESC
string.body: An Aether crystal extracted from a living creature. Unprocessed, it is dark and murky.

string.name: STR_quest_11046a_DESC
string.body: A small jewel box containing a pendant.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11101a_DESC
string.body: The epidermis of a Rynoce that has not been affected by petrifaction.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11101b_DESC
string.body: The epidermis of a Rynoce that has been affected by petrifaction.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11103a_DESC
string.body: A book very popular among Daevas.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11104a_DESC
string.body: An old watch. It is a relic of the Reian tribe that Savinus lost.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11104b_DESC
string.body: An ornamental hairpin whose patterns faded as the years passed. It is a relic of the Reian tribe that Savinus lost.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11105a_DESC
string.body: A letter from Oconerk to Meininerk. It doesn't look like a letter to just say hello.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11105b_DESC
string.body: A big, splendid diamond. It seems to be very expensive at a glance.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11106a_DESC
string.body: A mysterious book that can record voices. Nothing is written on it.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11106b_DESC
string.body: A mysterious book that can record voices. Savinus' story is written on it.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11106c_DESC
string.body: A mysterious book that can record voices. The stories of Savinus and Gelon are written on it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11107a_DESC
string.body: A box holding comfort items sent by Sanctum for the gate guards of Inggison.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11112a_DESC
string.body: It contains something yellowish and shiny.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11113a_DESC
string.body: The skin of a Laupede that feeds on gold. It glitters as if made of gold.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11114a_DESC
string.body: A very big and heavy gold ingot. It seems to be of great value.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11115a_DESC
string.body: Sturdy skin covered with hair. It looks very warm.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11115b_DESC
string.body: Wood obtained from Rotron's dried branches. It is perfect firewood.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11116a_DESC
string.body: Mookie needles used as cooking ingredients by the Shulack.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11116b_DESC
string.body: A traditional Shulack dish made by pickling Mookie needles. If preserved properly, its shelf life is unbelievably long.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11116c_DESC
string.body: A small square can containing fruity candy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11117a_DESC
string.body: This pill is effective in treating cold, stomach upset, inflammation, skin and eye diseases, etc.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11118a_DESC
string.body: A cold Seafom that is temporarily stunned.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11118b_DESC
string.body: A glass bottle containing Stunned Seafoams. It shines brightly even in the dark.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11121a_DESC
string.body: A shield drawn with incomprehensible patterns.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11121b_DESC
string.body: Some letters are written in Balaur language inside the ring.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11123a_DESC
string.body: This book seems to have been neglected for a long time. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 52 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11125a_DESC
string.body: A body tissue taken off from a Dragrint.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11125b_DESC
string.body: A body tissue taken off from a Crestlich.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11125c_DESC
string.body: A body tissue taken off from a Neokin.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11127a_DESC
string.body: A shell piece cut off from a Klaw.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11128a_DESC
string.body: A glittering jewel. It may be the item that Auralia has lost.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11129a_DESC
string.body: A scared item imbued with the power of Empyrean Lord Kaisinel.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11130a_DESC
string.body: A mark with Tiamat's symbol on it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11131a_DESC
string.body: A sign with the symbol of the Dragon Lord that the Dragonbound serve.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11200a_DESC
string.body: An insignia carried by enemy guards who defend the Altar of Avarice.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11203a_DESC
string.body: Concentrated form of sulphur that was instilled in the body of Dragrint.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11204a_DESC
string.body: A bottle of hard, congealed sulphur.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11204e_DESC
string.body: The kit contains a small shovel and bottles among other things.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11206a_DESC
string.body: Carapaces of Steel Scale Ksellids and Ksellikis. They are highly resistant to acidity.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11211a_DESC
string.body: A worn-out sack that has been used for a long time. It is well thumbed by Wivius.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11211b_DESC
string.body: Clothing that Wivius's ex-girlfriend gave him as a present. She seems to have an extraordinary sense of fashion.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11211c_DESC
string.body: It's a thick notebook covered in leather.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11211d_DESC
string.body: A medicine bottle containing turbid liquid. Wivius made this potion especially to use in an emergency.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11212a_DESC
string.body: A quartz that a Sematariux Convoy Legionary dropped. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 54 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11214a_DESC
string.body: An insignia carried by enemy guards who defend the Temple of Scales.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11216a_DESC
string.body: A map with four inscrutable star markings. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 54 or above.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11216b_DESC
string.body: A map marking four important regions in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11216b_DESC
string.body: A symbolic structure of Balaur that indicates the east.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11216c_DESC
string.body: A symbolic structure of Balaur that indicates the west.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11216d_DESC
string.body: A symbolic structure of Balaur that indicates the south.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11216e_DESC
string.body: A symbolic structure of Balaur that indicates the north.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11218a_DESC
string.body: A staff that a Balaur of Hanarkand used to have. A pattern pertinent to Balaur is engraved in it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11218b_DESC
string.body: A staff that a Balaur of Hanarkand used to have. A pattern pertinent to Balaur is engraved in it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11219a_DESC
string.body: A memory quartz that Zanuta, a Balaur elder of Hanarkand, used to have. It seems to hold secret Balaur information.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11220a_DESC
string.body: The hard, yet supple, skin of a Serrator.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11051a_DESC
string.body: A bandana made from a coarse and tough fabric. It was worn by the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11052a_DESC
string.body: A kind of crystal formed in a living creature. It is translucent and shiny.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11053a_DESC
string.body: These leaves are so dried that they seem to crumble easily in your hands.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11055a_DESC
string.body: A kind of crystal formed in a living creature. It is a little hot.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11055b_DESC
string.body: Although too big and crude, the hammer is very durable.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11056a_DESC
string.body: A secret order issued by Stanis. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 54 or above. Only one secret order quest can be acquired at a time.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11057a_DESC
string.body: A secret order issued by Stanis. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 54 or above. Only one secret order quest can be acquired at a time.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11058a_DESC
string.body: A secret order issued by Temenos. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 54 or above. Only one secret order quest can be acquired at a time.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11059a_DESC
string.body: Although it looks like a piece of rock, a close scrutiny reveals elaborate markings. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 55 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11060a_DESC
string.body: It glows brightly and indicates the arrival of a mission. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 55 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11061a_DESC
string.body: It glows brightly and indicates the arrival of a mission. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 55 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11062a_DESC
string.body: It glows brightly and indicates the arrival of a mission. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 55 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11063a_DESC
string.body: It glows brightly and indicates the arrival of a mission. Double-click to begin a quest. Elyos, level 55 or above.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11063b_DESC
string.body: The heart of Mastarius, Marchutan's agent. Ripped from a Daeva, it still beats.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11049a_DESC
string.body: A small stone that slightly vibrates.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11065a_DESC
string.body: It is mucous liquid and stinks a lot.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11064a_DESC
string.body: Thorns attached to the body of Leowasp. They are thin but hard.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11066a_DESC
string.body: A hard and rough shell of Serrator.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11221a_DESC
string.body: A lump of dust formed by dried and rough byproducts.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11205a_DESC
string.body: Rough and worn-out claws. They smell bad.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11068a_DESC
string.body: A report on abnormal wind currents discovered in Inggison. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11070a_DESC
string.body: A box wrapped with brown paper. The wrapping is torn and has marks of having been trampled.

string.name: STR_QUEST_10021c_DESC
string.body: This item is no longer used.\nYou can destroy it by removing it from the inventory or putting it in the rubbish bin.

string.name: STR_QUEST_10021d_DESC
string.body: This item is no longer used.\nYou can destroy it by removing it from the inventory or putting it in the rubbish bin.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11108a_DESC
string.body: A highly elastic piece of Baku leather.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11111a_DESC
string.body: It is the journal of the Dark Sage Aran.

string.name: STR_doc_quest_11139a_DESC
string.body: The journal of the Dark Sage Aran. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11142a_DESC
string.body: This feather is coarse but looks warm.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11142b_DESC
string.body: A long and tough-looking plant stem.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11143a_DESC
string.body: There is a sleeping Shulack baby inside this basket. Bring your ears close and you can hear the gentle breathing sound of the sleeping baby.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11146a_DESC
string.body: A Klaw egg that is about to hatch.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11148a_DESC
string.body: A large and tender looking piece of Vortile meat.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11148b_DESC
string.body: A big and fresh stamen of Moonflower.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11223a_DESC
string.body: Elemental water infused with Aether energy. It is crystal clear and very cold.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11226a_DESC
string.body: A tentacle that looks very chewy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11229a_DESC
string.body: A Wind Mushroom that grew on a cliff.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11229b_DESC
string.body: A Wind Mushroom that contains deadly poison.

string.name: STR_QUEST_11229c_DESC

string.name: STR_QUEST_16950A_DESC
string.body: The sealed secret mission that bears the Traitor's Seal contains the order to murder the leader of Goldrinyerk Limited. \nThe contents are encrypted and thus difficult to understand.

string.name: STR_QUEST_16950B_DESC
string.body: Internal floor plan for Goldrinyerk Limited, containing information on the work and workforce of Goldrinyerk Limited.\nIt might arouse curiosity, but it should be possible to protects the secrets of others.

string.name: STR_QUEST_16952A_DESC
string.body: A red crystal emanating weak magic.\nIf you hold your ear to it, you can hear a gentle, magical song.

string.name: STR_QUEST_16954A_DESC
string.body: This instrument belonged to Rumakiki, the captain of the Steel Rose.\nThe shimmering instrument has been polished brightly, and it seems to hold a strange magic.

string.name: STR_QUEST_26950A_DESC
string.body: The kill order is sealed with the Traitor's Seal. The leadership of Goldrinyerk Limited is to be murdered. \nThe contents are encrypted and thus difficult to understand.

string.name: STR_QUEST_26954A_DESC
string.body: This instrument belonged to Rumakiki, the captain of the Steel Rose.\nThe shimmering instrument has been polished brightly, and it seems to hold a strange magic.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12509A_DESC
string.body: Drakan sword that seems to be heavy\nA simply fashioned Balaur weapon.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12512A_DESC
string.body: A blue-glowing Cube fragment.\nThe blue glow is radiating Id energy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12513A_DESC
string.body: Sharp Fang of a Trained Taiga.\nIt looks pointy and sharp.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12515A_DESC
string.body: Old Vessel of the Rune Tribe\nThere are visible signs of wear on this old vessel of the Rune Tribe.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12521A_DESC
string.body: Headwear of unknown origin\nJudging by the fine appearance, the owner must have been a Daeva of high rank.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12523A
string.body: Mission map of the Desolate Camp

string.name: STR_QUEST_12523A_DESC
string.body: The mission map that you took from the commander of the Desolate Camp.\nThe affected area is marked in red.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12525A_DESC
string.body: Polearm of Cleansing\nThis polearm emits a cleansing power.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12527A_DESC
string.body: An empty Idgel Cube.\nThe cube appears to be totally empty.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12529A_DESC
string.body: A basket filled with kokonats.\nIt's filled with tasty kokonats.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12532A_DESC
string.body: Taiga meat\nIt doesn't smell particularly good, but it seems to be very nutritious.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12533A_DESC
string.body: An aromatic kokonat.\nIt's bigger than a normal kokonat and also seems to be of better quality.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_12534A_DESC
string.body: Saphirunerk's Records\nThe records were made with great attention and dated.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12535A_DESC
string.body: White flower\nThe fresh petals give off a delicate perfume.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12537A
string.body: Old Accessory of the Rune Tribe

string.name: STR_QUEST_12537A_DESC
string.body: Accessory that seems to be an artefact of the Rune Tribe\nIts archaic appearance seems to be concealing a secret.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12538A_DESC
string.body: Rotron twig.\nThe sweeping branches and leaves display colours that are very typical of the Katalam region.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12538B_DESC
string.body: An Agrint root.\nThe root displays a colouring that is characteristic of the Katalam area.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12540A_DESC
string.body: Repair tool used by the Kobolds\nSuitable for repairing axes used in woodworking.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12542A_DESC
string.body: Food ration offered by the Green Hat Alliance\nIt's still warm and should thus be delivered as quickly as possible.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12543A_DESC
string.body: Food rations issued by the Green Hat Alliance\nThe smell stirs the appetite.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12545A_DESC
string.body: Metal parts from the clearing machines\nThese seem to be mainly parts such as saw teeth, screws or couplings.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12547A_DESC
string.body: Wood of good quality\nIt can be used in many different ways if it is cut accordingly.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_12548A_DESC
string.body: Perinerk's Records\nPerinerk wrote up the information in a tidy manner and noted dates.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12552A_DESC
string.body: Contaminated tissue\nTissue Sample that has gone blue due to mutation.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12553A_DESC
string.body: Idgel lump\nThis lump looks very sticky.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12554B_DESC
string.body: A sample of a plant that grows in Katalam.\nWhat is noticeable are the unusually large leaves and the long stalk.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12558A_DESC
string.body: A tracing from the Rune Tribe Ramparts.\nIt is incomprehensible as the text was written in the language of the Rune Tribe, but the amount of text is enormous.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12558B_DESC
string.body: A tracing from the Rune Tribe Ramparts.\nIt is incomprehensible as the text was written in the language of the Rune Tribe, but the amount of text is enormous.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12559A_DESC
string.body: Item that you received from the Spirit of the Rune Tribe.\nIt is radiating with a strange chill. This item is undoubtedly connected to the Rune Tribe.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12562A_DESC
string.body: Blue Stone Shard\The strange-looking stone is emitting an unusual energy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_12564A_DESC
string.body: A stone from a Nevilim\nA mysterious, magical power emanates from the Rune Tribe symbols that are engraved on it.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_12565A_DESC
string.body: Book from the Spirit of the Rune Tribe\nIt's quite old. It seems to have belonged to the Rune Tribe once.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22509A_DESC
string.body: Crude Drakan sword\nA Balaur Weapon of rough shape.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22512A_DESC
string.body: A blue-glowing fragment of a Cube.\nThe blue glow is radiating Id energy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22513A_DESC
string.body: Hard molar of a trained Taiga\nThis tooth looks very robust. It doesn't show the least amount of damage.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22515A_DESC
string.body: Tableware of the Rune Tribe\nThe old vessels shows some traces of the Rune Tribe.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22521A_DESC
string.body: An unknown owner's headwear.\nJudging from its elegant appearance, this headwear must have belonged to a high-ranking Daeva.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22523A
string.body: Mission map of the destroyed Beritra Guard Post

string.name: STR_QUEST_22523A_DESC
string.body: The mission map that you took from the commander of the Destroyed Beritra Guard Post.\nThe affected area is marked in red.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22525A_DESC
string.body: Staff of Purification\nThis staff radiates a power of clarity and cleansing.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22527A_DESC
string.body: A used Idgel Cube.\nThe cube appears to be totally empty.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22529A_DESC
string.body: A basket filled with kokonats.\nIt's filled with tasty kokonats.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22532A_DESC
string.body: A piece of Taiga meat\nIt doesn't smell particularly good, but it seems to be very nutritious.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22533A_DESC
string.body: An aromatic kokonat.\nIt's bigger than a normal kokonat and also seems to be of better quality.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_22534A_DESC
string.body: Notebook that Rubininerk carried with him\nThe records were made with great attention and also dated.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22535A_DESC
string.body: White flower\nThe fresh petals give off a delicate perfume.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22538A_DESC
string.body: Root of a Rotron\nThe ends of the root have taken on a blue colouring due to the mutation.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22540A_DESC
string.body: Repair tool used by the Kobold Labourers\nCould be used to repair a clearing device.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22542A_DESC
string.body: Food ration offered by the Green Hat Alliance\nIt's still warm and should thus be delivered as quickly as possible.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22543A_DESC
string.body: Green Hat Alliance food rations\nThe smell stirs the appetite.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22545A_DESC
string.body: Metal parts from the clearing machines\nThese seem to be mainly parts such as saw teeth, screws or couplings.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22547A_DESC
string.body: Wood of good quality\nIt can be used in many different ways if cut accordingly.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_22548A_DESC
string.body: Rogrinerk's Notebook\nEvery entry has been neatly written up and dated.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22552A
string.body: Combat orders of the Attack Squad

string.name: STR_QUEST_22552A_DESC
string.body: The Guardians' combat orders.\nThe scroll contains the combat order for the Patrol from Katalam.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22558A_DESC
string.body: A tracing from the Rune Tribe Ramparts.\nIt is incomprehensible as the text was written in the language of the Rune Tribe, but the amount of text is enormous.

string.name: STR_QUEST_22558B_DESC
string.body: A tracing from the Rune Tribe Ramparts.\nIt is incomprehensible as the text was written in the language of the Rune Tribe, but the amount of text is enormous.

string.name: STR_QUEST_16921A_DESC
string.body: Grendal's Research Report.\nThe paper is worn. The contents of this document seem to have been amended a few times and are difficult to decipher. An expert on ancient cultures in the Katalam Underground would surely be very interested in this.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE82_DESC
string.body: Whilst helping Tanitia investigate the Humnaz Garrison, you acquired this unique and disagreeable scent.

string.body: You obtained the power to neutralise Siel's Relics.

string.body: Breaking up the Elyos Scout Band

string.body: Defeated an Elyos Special Scout and Scout Leader.

string.body: Explored Tiamaranta's Eye, the heart of Tiamaranta.

string.body: You are a member of the exclusive Siel's Spear Legion.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE87_DESC
string.body: Refers to a Daeva who owns a house.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE88_DESC
string.body: You engaged in an undercover operation and successfully incapacitated the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE89_DESC
string.body: Refers to a Daeva who defeated Raksha sealed in Raksang.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE90_DESC
string.body: You helped Mewrinerk woo the Shugo of his dreams.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE91_DESC
string.body: You defeated Zadra Spellweaver and reclaimed Argent Manor for Davlin.

string.name: STR_DARK_TITLE92_DESC
string.body: You defeated the Vasharti Legion and ended the invasion of Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE82_DESC
string.body: Ended the doomed love affair between Owllaet and Aurio.

string.body: You obtained the power to neutralise Siel's Relics.

string.body: Breaking up the Asmodian Scout Band

string.body: Defeated an Asmodian Special Scout and Scout Leader.

string.body: Visited Tiamaranta Eye, the heart of Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE86_DESC
string.body: You are a member of the exclusive Siel's Spear Legion.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE87_DESC
string.body: It refers to a rich Daeva who owns a house in Oriel.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE88_DESC
string.body: Engaged in an infiltration operation and successfully capacitated the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE89_DESC
string.body: You broke the seal on Raksang and defeated Raksha.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE90_DESC
string.body: Helped Sesinerk achieve the dream of being a Daeva even for a short period of time.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE91_DESC
string.body: Defeated Zadra Spellweaver and rescued Davlin.

string.name: STR_LIGHT_TITLE92_DESC
string.body: You defeated the Vasharti Legion and ended the invasion of Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE223_DESC
string.body: It refers to a Windborn Child, a Daeva of wanderlust.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE224_DESC
string.body: Refers to a Daeva who seems destined to be a hero.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE225_DESC
string.body: A clown is the heart of the festival. It refers to a Daeva who knows how to enjoy life.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE226_DESC
string.body: Wish to be a student leader, even just for one week.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE227_DESC
string.body: Refers to a Daeva who lightens the stage without a line.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE228_DESC
string.body: Sonic boom! Refers to a Daeva who runs in the speed of wind.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE229_DESC
string.body: Amazing! Refers to a Daeva who runs faster than light.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE230_DESC
string.body: The house is like a burnt bird, with no branches to nest in. May it bring a smile first, which will be wept away in the end.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE231_DESC
string.body: The Daeva meets with misfortune, which forbids food for three days. Such is the suffering of Siel the Empyrean Lord, of trouble and poverty that await in the Odella Thorn Forest.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE232_DESC
string.body: Beautiful in colour but in a bad luck. The group sees no unity and disperses in malicious gossip. Kinah will be lost and the Daeva will leave.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE233_DESC
string.body: It's no better than having stepped on Tahabata's tail without a group to support you. Be aware, take caution, and know fear. It doesn't need both feet to do it.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE235_DESC
string.body: You receive this title for taking part in the beer festival.

string.name: STR_ALL_TITLE236_DESC
string.body: You answered the request of the Trade Guild.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15502a_DESC
string.body: A Crystal of Immortal Light can be produced using a Fragment of the Tower of Eternity. You can sense the holy energy that surrounds it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15508a_DESC
string.body: Remains that probably come from Atreia's aborigines. They've been shattered in several places, making them difficult to identify.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15511a_DESC
string.body: A bone that probably came from the skeleton of an Atreian aborigine. It carries traces of a strange magic.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15517a_DESC
string.body: A small, destroyed Light Crystal. This is used to make totems.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15523a_DESC
string.body: A fragment of a stone plate with an illegible inscription on it. The plate has been damaged so heavily over time that you can't recognise anything on it any more.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15526a_DESC
string.body: Part of a generator that is linked to the Petralith. It's broken so it can no longer be used.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15532a_DESC
string.body: Aether Ore that has formed from the ancient Aether. It radiates a strange blue light.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15535a_DESC
string.body: Spores filled with Aetheric energy that glow blue. They're very delicate and therefore need to be handled with the utmost care.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25526a_DESC
string.body: Illusion Flowers don't die, they go straight from the bloom phase to seeds and grow back. It's surrounded by a strange energy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25532a_DESC
string.body: Aether Ore that has formed from the ancient Aether. It radiates a strange blue light.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25535a_DESC
string.body: The seeds of the magnificent Saphora Flower, filled with Aetheric energy. They're very delicate and therefore need to be handled with the utmost care.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15601a_DESC
string.body: An old diary that only has a few pages left in it. It obviously used to belong to the pirates.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15602a_DESC
string.body: A tribute that someone has to pay. It stinks and it definitely shouldn't be eaten.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15605a_DESC
string.body: A device for researching the ruins. It's at the forefront of technology and automatically provides you with information about the ruins if you use it to investigate them.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15606a_DESC
string.body: They contain information about the training of the Storm Daevas, written down long ago.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15606b_DESC
string.body: A chest that seems to belong to the Storm Daevas and obviously contains something important.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15608a_DESC
string.body: Foul stinking spores that are obviously in an advanced state of decay.

string.name: STR_QUEST_15613a_DESC
string.body: It seems to be the insignia of an unknown fanatic. It seems somehow familiar to you, but you can't remember it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25601a_DESC
string.body: A feather from Sphiro's descendants. It contains Sphiro's Power.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25601b_DESC
string.body: A feather from Sphiro's descendants. It contains Sphiro's Power. You can use it in Sphiro's Territory by double-clicking.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25602a_DESC
string.body: A fragment of the creatures that are draining the forest of energy.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25604a_DESC
string.body: It seems to be the insignia of an unknown fanatic. It seems somehow familiar to you, but you can't remember it.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25605a_DESC
string.body: The essence of Daevas who are caught between dimensions. Gather Essence of Time to activate the generator to control the unstable space-time rift.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25605b_DESC
string.body: A device to restabilise the unstable space-time rift. Can be used near the Ruins of History by double-clicking.

string.name: STR_DOC_QUEST_25606a_DESC
string.body: That looks like Lini's Old Diary. You shouldn't pry into the young girl's private affairs, but there's no other way to find out more about her fate. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_QUEST_25608a_DESC
string.body: A pouch containing the world's best honey, made from the nectar of the Saphora Flower. It exudes a very strong fragrance and tastes particularly sweet.

string.body: Remove the cursed Rim Ore to weaken the Undead.
